name: arihua - php framework
short_description:
THE FRAMEWORK

Our framework arises from the requirements of a simple, light, easy to learn, tool, for rapid, stable and affordable software design for the Small and Medium Enterprise.

100% web based, ArihuA is natively built upon a LAMP architecture, though it is cross platform + cross browser. It has been successfully tested on Linux (Debian, Ubuntu), Mac OSX and Windows Operative System. 

It is entirely written in Object Oriented PHP, and it is based on a strong MVC architecture. 


HISTORY

arihua is the term for "soul" in raramuri, a Mexican indigenous language of the Uto-Aztecan family, spoken by 70,000 people in the state of Chihuahua.

Several years ago, when we developed the prototype framework, we were working on computer alphabetizing and e-inclusion, especially in Central America. We received support from several people and professionals all around the world. 

The ArihuA software share, throughout its open code, the efforts of these "souls".
summary: ArihuA - small php framework for sites and web services
